Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: EILEEN G.
Reviews.Content: This phone is really unlocked, I received it on time and with its original box and all the accesories in. It works perfectly in Venezuela! Love it

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: MARYURI ABREU
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MY NEW PHONE, IT IS GREAT AND BEUTIFULL. IT WAS SHIPPED ON TIME AND WORD VERY WELL IN VENEZUELA

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone!
Reviews.Author: PabloRodCam
Reviews.Content: For those who don't need the latest and most expensive phone on the market.  It's very fast and nice.  Very good choice.  No problems at all.

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Pedro Segundo Zuvic
Reviews.Content: Works great in Venezuela no problems at all, just slip in the sim card, and you ll be all set

Reviews.Title: A great Purchase!
Reviews.Author: Kurshel Marcano
Reviews.Content: a great purchase. I received the product in great condition with all the necessary accessories and literature. The phone was unlocked and it worked well with my network in Trinidad & Tobago.

Reviews.Title: In love with my phone!!
Reviews.Author: Siulmily
Reviews.Content: It`s so useful!! The camera it's great!! Texts and calls works very well!! I din't use an extra memory yet but with only 8gb internal memory it`s support a lot of information (pics, video, voice note, apps...). The size is ok, not too small, not too big. It has some interesting skills as the written notes, you can write anything in your phone and save it anytime you need it. If you're a writter or productor that skill keep very well those ideas you get in the subway, for example! It has differents way to save battery. I charge it once at day only. For me it's a terrific phone! <3

Reviews.Title: Excellent cell phone
Reviews.Author: Anyel
Reviews.Content: good store, good product without problems. I recommendi rate five stars because i dont have any problems in Venezuela. I wrote this in my first day of proof

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Amilcar
Reviews.Content: excellent product, only two things: the product does not come with the Spanish language, only English German Japanese Taiwan and others, and despite having submitted a claim, they charged me $ 14 of more for the product. I guess that is the problem of the exchange rate in my country. I hope it does not pass next time. thanks

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY "ON THE GO SOLUTIONS"
Reviews.Author: Domingo Leon
Reviews.Content: do not buy "On the go solutions" they sold me a Chinese imitation. and now don't work the wifi.... please be careful with this store.

Reviews.Title: Good!
Reviews.Author: Cintia
Reviews.Content: Good product! The cell phone is very slim and beautiful. Good screen size and light weight. I'd recommend it to my friends!

Reviews.Title: Waste of time and money
Reviews.Author: Dorian
Reviews.Content: I hardly consider this seller again. The phone was dented on the back case. I had to find a new battery because it does not work, and now, only 1 month later, the phone is not turning on at all. I think I lost my money!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Smartphone
Reviews.Author: Nayleth Duran "the international one"
Reviews.Content: Im from Venezuela, the phone is great, easy to use, really work with any company like movistar witch i choose, the smarphone is fast, the camara works great too, really nice pictures, everything is ok, only the battery charge don't last 2 days on the row, or maybe if you don't use it that much. But i recomend it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome phone
Reviews.Author: Keiunna Thompson
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. It came in its original packing, untouched. I had a bit of a problem with the 3G, but that was resolved and now all of it works. It works with Straight Talk, so that was music to my ears. In love with this phone. Runs like a dream and is a nice size.

Reviews.Title: Perfect gift for my mom
Reviews.Author: Bárbara
Reviews.Content: Phone works perfectly in Venezuela, is easy to use and my mom loves it. The only thing I hate is the charger, is european and don't works here even with the adapter that came with it, I had to buy a new charger.

Reviews.Title: Ecelente vendedor
Reviews.Author: Elvis Doce
Reviews.Content: Excelente vendedor llego lo pedido con algun retardo pero por problemas en la aduanas de venezuela.llego a tiempo a miami.

Reviews.Title: faulty product
Reviews.Author: Bradley Ferdinand
Reviews.Content: after 2 days of using this phone the software started malfunctioning ..phones goes off every now and then...very disappointed in this phone,,,,,,was waste of my money ot satisfied at all

Reviews.Title: Great phone I could used it in Rome.
Reviews.Author: Antonio Paredes "Walls"
Reviews.Content: I am happy I can used it in Rome, it is very handle and practical. As soon as I put the SIM card it worked. '.'

Reviews.Title: SIII Mini
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: My wife loved this phone, it is a very good equipment and it works at Brazil as we expected. I recommend.

Reviews.Title: GREAT!!
Reviews.Author: Gustavo
Reviews.Content: Great phone, but, very weak screen!CAUTION, DON'T LET IT FALL!The screen glass is very expensive in Venezuela, and very weak!

Reviews.Title: Phone refurbished
Reviews.Author: Jose iguaros
Reviews.Content: Sell ​​phones that say they are rebuilt and new buy 2 phones and one was burned at 2 months and the other has software problems, take it to samsung for international warranty and are not even registered to be rebuilt, these phones are not new, this is unacceptable.

Reviews.Title: Sumsung USA warranty does not cover international phones models GT-I8190
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: Be aware of this phone model GT-I8190 is an international model number so if the phone brakes Samsung USA is not going to repair or replace the phone for you.  If the phone brakes during the first three months, you can return it to amazon but if brakes after 3 months you have to report the problem to Samsung and they are not going to fix the issue for you.  In summary,  Amazon should not allow re-seller to sell international phones to US customer!!!Sumsung USA warranty does not cover international phones models GT-I8190

Reviews.Title: It's a really nice phone, I like it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought the phone and it didn't work properly, I sent it back and I received the new one. I haven't found any problems and everything is working perfectly!

Reviews.Title: great phone, working aboard with no issues
Reviews.Author: Dmitry D.
Reviews.Content: great product have no problem at all, just plug and play! Only one thing: it have no hebrew language on it :)

Reviews.Title: awesme
Reviews.Author: Alma
Reviews.Content: smaller than real s3 or s4 so it easily fits to my pockets (that's why i bought mini). good quality

Reviews.Title: Value for money
Reviews.Author: Kalana Jinadasa "Kalana j"
Reviews.Content: Impressed with the phone and for the money I spent its worthwhile investmentI strongly recommend buying this and with this supplier

Reviews.Title: Amazing phone at a great price!
Reviews.Author: Josie
Reviews.Content: So far it is an amazing phone. Highly recommended. The only thing I don't like it's the headphones. Since they are just an accessory, I discarded those and use the ones from my iPod.

Reviews.Title: I liked it
Reviews.Author: Virginia Guerrero
Reviews.Content: This cellphone comes in excellent conditions, This is my favorite brand, and my family all have one samsung! yes !

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: romina rossi
Reviews.Content: The package arrived on time and in perfect conditions. It worked IWith my Argentinean SIM card with no issues. Lovely in white colour.

Reviews.Title: Wrong Description
Reviews.Author: Karen Marquez
Reviews.Content: I bought this Cellphone because in the description says it supports 900mhz Frecuency and it doesnt... now i cant use 3g with my operator in my country (Venezuela)... in other words i lost my money.

Reviews.Title: More information
Reviews.Author: Jose Castejon
Reviews.Content: I wish to get more information about this phone. know if it works with sim cards.i live in venezuela ia have to meke sure it can be used here

Reviews.Title: Brilliant features and built quality
Reviews.Author: Sanket Adhikari
Reviews.Content: I like the look and feel since this is a little smaller than the regular full blown smartphones.But the beauty is the size since it packs everythingPros: Color, Built Quality, Screen clarityCons: Haven't found any so far

Reviews.Title: excellent quality
Reviews.Author: carlos vaamonde
Reviews.Content: I had many doubts which galaxy model to buy, but this team is a real cell smart phone, comfortable, easy to use, fast and no doubt represents and worth the investment, it worked perfectly in my country Venezuela (movilnet)

Reviews.Title: Terrific phone!
Reviews.Author: Puddie Bear "explorer"
Reviews.Content: This phone is so awesome that I ordered five more for family a and friends. No one has had a single complaint about it.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Hrefna I.
Reviews.Content: Works without problems in Europe. Unlocked. Comes with a European charger with two pins. I am very happy with this phone, it is lightweight and elegant.

Reviews.Title: Recommand
Reviews.Author: mrymstylm
Reviews.Content: (seems) NO Sign of Defect, come w' everything inside the Box(+ a adapter for charger provided)work with T-Mobile, phone functions well, (right now can update to Android 4.1.1)**Be Aware, does NOT work with Micro-Sim Card**

Reviews.Title: Some things do not work
Reviews.Author: Mariana
Reviews.Content: Phone is not working,  first it was about battery charging and system overload problems, the charger that came with the phone dose not work for day one. Y bought a new one, but know the cell phone dose not recognise de battery nor the simple chip. It's exhausting how much trouble I've been having with this cellphone.

Reviews.Title: FINE =D
Reviews.Author: gerardo
Reviews.Content: It`s so useful!! The camera it's great!! Texts and calls works very well!! I din't use an extra memory yet but with only 8gb internal memory it`s support a lot of information (pics, video, voice note, apps...). The size is ok, not too small, not too big. It has some interesting skills as the written notes, you can write anything in your phone and save it anytime you need it. If you're a writter or productor that skill keep very well those ideas you get in the subway, for example! It has differents way to save battery. I charge it once at day only. For me it's a terrific phone! <3

Reviews.Title: First Unlocked Smartphone Purchase via Amazon
Reviews.Author: Alexandra
Reviews.Content: First of all, I bought this phone in June 2013 and I loved it. It's now February 2014, and I'm still loving it. Shipping was fast. Set-up was a matter of unpacking and inserting my SIM card. Easy! At this point, I'm considering purchasing all my mobile devices from here - but I still have love for this handset, lol...

Reviews.Title: Battery problem.
Reviews.Author: Alexander R.
Reviews.Content: The phone came with the battery dead, i used it like 2 days and the battery never work again. For the next time i buy an LG.

Reviews.Title: the phone they sent me this damage
Reviews.Author: Ambar Peyre
Reviews.Content: the phone they sent me this bad, the screen keeps flashing and is never turned off, the battery is consumed too fast for this error phone and can not be used either for the same problem, I hope for other bands send phone in good condition or to review them before sending it and sell it. for this reason I do not like to purchase anything you make for the international s3mini sansumgl

Reviews.Title: problems with battery charger and headphones
Reviews.Author: Maria Jose Martinez
Reviews.Content: The telephone has 2 problems;  the battery never arrives to 100% charge, even turned off. Also it is very difficult for me to be able to charge it, i have to move the cable many many times until it finally decides to start charging.  It makes me lose a lot of time every time I want to charge it,  which is like 3 times per day, cause I use it a lot and the battery discharges super fast.Regarding the headphones, it only works ok one of the sides,  the other does not work.

Reviews.Title: Good product, packaging without details, Recommended!
Reviews.Author: Josi Oviedo "Jos"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone in October last year and so far, has been very good! The Internet is fast enough, you can do many things with this cellphone...The only problem I've had is that the charger stopped working last december!... Without reason! :( . The telephone works pretty well with Movilnet in Venezuela.

Reviews.Title: BEAUTIFUL AND EXCELLENT!
Reviews.Author: Isabella Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: This phone fulfilled all the required needs, I'm from Venezuela and I had no problems .... excellent product, excellent price.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENCE IN DESIGN!
Reviews.Author: Dario Jose Miranda Bolaño
Reviews.Content: I CHOSE THIS ITEM DUE TO ITS PRICE, BEAUTY AND EXCELENT DESIGN. ALSO I WANTED TO CHANGE BLACBERRY TECNOLOGY INTO ANDROID POLIFACETIC ITEM.

Reviews.Title: I like the phone, BUT it doesn't work properly.
Reviews.Author: M. H. Chen
Reviews.Content: I like Samsung phone, BUT this....Once I got my package, I opened it and saw that the phone seems like was opened before.But I was not beware at that time. I still went to charge the phone for a night and started it on the next day.When I started the phone and set up the settings, I saw the battery was approximately only 30% left. Then I charged it again.The PROBLEM came up!I connected it with the charger ONLY, but the phone was shown as "earphones connected" instead of the "charging battery" sign. And I discharged the phone, then exited the music menu, see if the phone was okay. Then, I charged it again, the "earphones connected" sign showed up AGAIN! The music menu pop-up makes the phone doesn't work right.I returned it immediately...When I brought the phone, I was choosing the "NEW" one. But the phone came as the defective one. I was so upset about this phone I brought.

Reviews.Title: Cell phone doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: I bought this device for a present to my wife.  Unfortunately, it didn't work properly from the beginning. The first day, when we tried to charge it, it turned off. Then, even though it was unplugged, it continued showing the phrase CHARGING %, and the icon of a battery charging. We tried connecting it to a USB terminal of a computer, but the failure persisted.  The next day, it didn't start at all. The person in charge of CUSTOMER SERVICE (Mr. Sam) offered us to try with a new battery, but since this is a presente and a NEW DEVICE, I think it shouldn't present this kind of problems for what I have requested the complete replacement.My wife's name is Silvia Iturbe and she's been in touch with the person from de store. However, no final action has been taken yet.  I hope to receive good news today. I will keep you informed, but if you can do something about this event, I would really appreciate it.Thank you very muchLuis Ramirez

Reviews.Title: Horrible battery life, smart toy, not a phone, not for people relying on it.
Reviews.Author: Mommy of 2
Reviews.Content: Battery life is #1 concern 1-2 day is max even with everything turned off and low contrast screen.My 5y.o. old phone SonyEricsson K750i use to have 7+ days online and working in the beginning, and 3 days online easily with old battery, before I decided to switch.Worst decision ever, don't waste your money on it.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: anehia "anehia"
Reviews.Content: Good price and phone however it clearly was a Tmobile phone prior to being unlocked and had a number of apps already downloaded.

Reviews.Title: Clean unlocked new phone
Reviews.Author: carlos alanis
Reviews.Content: Just as described.  Unlocked GSM phone... only unexpected finding is that the power converter / charger is for the European market and cant be plugged in US outlets.  All else is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: karla
Reviews.Content: Excellent product. It came as specified by seller. Original box and software. Battery last a considerable amount of time. Of course, it will depend on how many applications you have running or the wallpapers you use for lock and home screen (live wallpapers tend to make your battery run our of charge quickly). For the rest I am very pleased with this purchase. I just installed my SD card in it and started to used it right away. I use it with movistar service in Venezuela. I will buy again from this seller.

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: Marlene
Reviews.Content: Easy to navigate, features are easy to learn (even though there's no product guide's booklet in English ).. I can easily get in touch with my family and friends in my homeland through viber apps.

Reviews.Title: Worst ever!!!
Reviews.Author: Cedella P.
Reviews.Content: The screen is not sensitive at all. All the bottom of the phone does not even work no matter how much times you tap/touch it. Worse phone ever. There is a constant missed call stuck on the phone when there is no missed call. I'm so disappointed. Looks like this phone isn't new just rooted.Angry

Reviews.Title: This phone is remarkable
Reviews.Author: amazonshopper
Reviews.Content: This phone came unlocked and ready to go. Insert your sim card and it works. The apps are great and additional apps are easy to download. Camera takes fantastic photos. Great resolution. There are 2 cameras front and back. Take videos as well. It's easy to share photos and videos. Great little phone with everything you want in a smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone , nice size
Reviews.Author: Achala Aponso
Reviews.Content: This is a nice phone which fits to the hand. No need of finger gymnastic. Easy to handle.  Quality display.

Reviews.Title: Good phone but
Reviews.Author: IOANNIS GRIGORAKOS
Reviews.Content: Opened box with no headphones inside. Got the spare ear silicone parts but no headphones.Other than that phone is good and as described

Reviews.Title: i like it
Reviews.Author: Naylis T. Sanchez R "Nini"
Reviews.Content: excelent  buy it if you like itI recommended it cloed eyesenjoi it! its very cute and beautifulli love it

Reviews.Title: Great cell phone
Reviews.Author: JOSE FERREIRA
Reviews.Content: Great cell phone, meets all the specified functions, high quality in every way. Brand new and ready to use. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Ziems
Reviews.Content: Phone arrived in perfect conditions to my country. This size is excellent for women. I think that it's better than Blackberry.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Jesus Chujoy
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Galaxy S3 mini arrived quickly and in new mint condition...All parts were complete, nothing missing and in sealed box. The cell phone works excellent! Thank you!

Reviews.Title: everything ok
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Pinheiro
Reviews.Content: everything ok, thanks from Venezuela! comfort & fit of a shirt or the battery life of a camera thnak you

Reviews.Title: Defective Phone
Reviews.Author: Melissa Edwards
Reviews.Content: After SIX (6) months the phone stops working. It switched off and up to date the phone is not coming on, it’s not responding to anything. The phone is defective, I did not get what I paid for, I did not get my money’s worth. I would not encourage anyone to purchase a phone from that seller.

Reviews.Title: UFFFFFFFFFFFFFF
Reviews.Author: JOSE
Reviews.Content: ESTE TELEFONO ES LO MEJOR QUE SAMSUNG HA PODIDO FABRICAR, ESTAN BUENO QUE TRAE LA FUNCION PARA DISCAPACITADOS, MUY BUENO

Reviews.Title: ONLY LASTED 2 WEEKS
Reviews.Author: Ninoska Villalobos
Reviews.Content: The phone came with a battery with 4 slots connectors and the phone only has 3 pins. One morning the phone was dead, no lights, no sound, no nothing. Please check this, I don't know if the battery had to do with it, but the original Samsung battery only has 3 slots connectors as the cell phone. I'm sending back the phone to the supplier, they will change it for a new one.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy S 3 mini
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: I was happy until I started having problems with it charging.  I can not seem to ever get a full charge any longer.  I'm very disappointed.  I like how the phone operates though.  I have had the phone checked out by 2 different specialists and they can not pinpoint the problem with the charging issue.  I actually wish I could send tis one back and get another.  I think something has just gone wrong with this particular phone.

Reviews.Title: Samsung I8190 S3 Mini Unlocked White Android
Reviews.Author: dropwizard
Reviews.Content: This superb phone with many features is just right to fit into my jean pocket or in a small purse with ease great item to buy

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Yajaira Moreno
Reviews.Content: Excellent I expected, very cute, practical, comfortable .... punctual deliveries and the office ... came with the option to place him in Spanish language.....  many thanks

Reviews.Title: samsung
Reviews.Author: jillian
Reviews.Content: Thanks it was fast and I love the service and the the person was on key and I get my phone so I could use it more thanks again

Reviews.Title: very good product I recommend
Reviews.Author: Jesús salvador pino ferrer
Reviews.Content: very good product I recommend sealing the phone comes complete with all accessories thank you very much for sending the product as described by

Reviews.Title: Very dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Dan Dolash
Reviews.Content: Didn't work at all with any sim cards and not open in the US. Very dissapointed with the outcome after spending the money

Reviews.Title: The phone stopped working
Reviews.Author: José Martínez
Reviews.Content: Buy this phone last December, received in mid-January and from about a month ago stopped working, just not lit more. I want to emphasize that no misuse of cell phone and want to see if still in warranty to use it.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Dari
Reviews.Content: I love my phone, it was a little complicated to find the carrier, but I found one AT&T.; I'm very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: jbravo07 "jbravo07"
Reviews.Content: Samsungs smartphones are beautiful, smart, light weight, easy to use and with good price, this one is not a exception!

Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: Alberto Arroyo
Reviews.Content: excellent product.! All in perfect condition, very well packaged and in perfect condition. as is as described in the publication. This shop is recommended 100%

Reviews.Title: Does not work! Save your money.
Reviews.Author: Monica Ilogienboh
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for a family member and within a few days it malfunctioned. Now, it will not turn on at all. If zero stars was a rating I would put it. Be careful who you buy your electronics from.

Reviews.Title: 100 % recommended
Reviews.Author: Diego Ramirez
Reviews.Content: great phone for only 300$ totally recommended for venezuelan people cause we only got 300$ for electronic shopping, get it now

Reviews.Title: Waht a good one
Reviews.Author: Francisco
Reviews.Content: It's an excelent smartphone, nice, light, handly and friendly, very good!! Only the keyboard is a little annoying, but is not a big deal.

Reviews.Title: Excelent smartphone..!!
Reviews.Author: Charlin Briceño
Reviews.Content: This is a beautifull and practic smartphone, sometimes when is low battery, works slowly, but when is full charged the battery is so fast..!!

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Robert Contreras
Reviews.Content: the purchase of the article, it was excellent, I fulfilled my request, I am happy. Categorization and gave the five-star by the speed and effectiveness of delivery.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Phone
Reviews.Author: Bony Caraballo
Reviews.Content: Very nice phone, I like it size of it easy to carry around, and work perfectly, just what i needed.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: ASTRID SAYAGO
Reviews.Content: samsung gt-i8190 galaxy mini s3 3g fact un locked its perfect for me i can use in Venezuela perfectly  t

Reviews.Title: Buyer beware
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: This phone had glitches that were not disclosed by the seller. Yes, it makes phone calls, and yes it sends texts, and yes it accesses the internet, but does it do it well? NO! This phone does not work like it should.

Reviews.Title: perfect excellent condition
Reviews.Author: jesus
Reviews.Content: very good team responsible team arrived in perfect condition I like to recommend the phone works very well is perfect thanks.

Reviews.Title: It works perfectly in Venezuela Movilnet
Reviews.Author: Edgard Maiquetia
Reviews.Content: Its a good choice!!! It uses a normal Sim Card and works perfect with a 16 Gb memory card. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Not so good.
Reviews.Author: s-bittner
Reviews.Content: I really love Samsung....but although I just got that phone a few weeks ago it freezes from time to time.....really getting on my nerves....

Reviews.Title: FROM VENEZUELA FOR THE WHOLE WORLD
Reviews.Author: Wilmer
Reviews.Content: Excellent in good condition the product of white impeccable color is my second s3 mini that I buy for amazon I cannot complain it is a gift for my breast his day of the mothers from Venezuela!!!! Thank you I recommend 100 % this seller

Reviews.Title: is not original celphone
Reviews.Author: orlando villavicencio
Reviews.Content: It is not original because his serial is false when they check it with the laser of the samsung is a fraud

Reviews.Title: PERFECT!!
Reviews.Author: Yennicortes
Reviews.Content: IT IS AN EXCELLENT PRODUCT. IT IS WORKS VERY WELL.RIGHT PRODUCT IS A REQUIRED TO USE. JUST ARRIVED ON TIME.IS IN EXCELLENT CONDITION. BRAND NEW PRODUCT

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: LUISA GOMEZ
Reviews.Content: VERY NICE CELL I AM VERY HAPPY WITH IT. I RECOMMEND IT AND ITS A GOOD DEAL. NICE COLOR A GOOD SIZE

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Jane Ikeji
Reviews.Content: It is the smartest phone ever, I live this product and I believe Samsung taught it wise to give the world the best phone everThank you Samsung

Reviews.Title: all good
Reviews.Author: luis morales
Reviews.Content: all good product came in perfect condition and at the right time and the excellent quality and a fair price

Reviews.Title: Slowish
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "poixr"
Reviews.Content: It works ok, but when you get a number of apps installed on it and use it for a while it can get really, really slow.  Needs more ram.

Reviews.Title: It flies!
Reviews.Author: Natalia
Reviews.Content: I love this phone! It is so beautiful, white, great design. As for the performance, it flies! Very fast and comfortable to use!

Reviews.Title: HELP!!!!
Reviews.Author: maria
Reviews.Content: buy this phone in November last year and is already hurt me, take it to the samsung here in Venezuele and was told that the code did not serve him he was a rebuilt phone

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy S III 3 mini 8GB i8190 HSUPA/HSPDA 900/1900/2100 mps 5MP CAMERA FACTORY UNLOCKED Marble White INTERNATIONAL VERS
Reviews.Author: Luis Vasquez
Reviews.Content: The phone has many problems. The battery is damaged, I had to buy a new one. It is difficult to make a call, sometimes stops working and does not receive calls. I went to a Samsung authorized agent and was informed that it is not genuine, it is a copy, so no warranty! Do not buy from this seller is a scammer! Possibly who give score of 5 were lucky that the phone will work but it is still an imitation, it is not the original! I lost my money.LuisCaracas-Venezuela

Reviews.Title: Works!
Reviews.Author: Eipico
Reviews.Content: Great entry level Android phone with a reputed brand. Does not have 4G, it did not claim to - so we are good there. Arrived with a non-US charger - I did not really expect that. I assumed even if I am buying an international version; the charger should be for US since I am buying it here.

Reviews.Title: Apple user..but I love Samsung Galaxys3 Mini
Reviews.Author: Rudy Mairena
Reviews.Content: I love this Samsung GalaxyS3 Mini unlocked phone. I am a iPhone user it's a big difference Apple. But that is good too this Andriod has more options then Apple does. I'm NOT hating on Apple or anything but it's a great phone. I am still getting used to this phone I like it so far.Pros: Running Andriod, more options, beautiful colors, bigger screen.Cons: sensitive power button, very sensitive touchscreen, Ok front facing camera quality. heavy

Reviews.Title: FINE
Reviews.Author: Miguel Angel Pomier Medina
Reviews.Content: I agree with the quality of the product received.The quality standard fulfilled my expectations. I will be shopping this same supplier.

Reviews.Title: Good cell
Reviews.Author: Eduardon
Reviews.Content: This cell did not buy it for my use but facilitated the purchase to a friend. He tells me that the phone it worked very well and did not probelmas to turn in our country (Ecuador)

Reviews.Title: my Mini Samsung
Reviews.Author: Sandra Samaniego
Reviews.Content: I love it, i got it on time and i am enjoying it so much. i was planning to get the bigger one, but could not pass on this deal. I'm glad i got it

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Vargas
Reviews.Content: there is the best

Reviews.Title: Very good phone given the price
Reviews.Author: Martin S Panizza "Martu"
Reviews.Content: Very good phone given the price. I purchased this model 'cause I live in Argentina and they recommend me this version. So far, it worked very well.

Reviews.Title: This is so nice!
Reviews.Author: Sarah Pace
Reviews.Content: This was really nice. It is brand new, works with Consumer Cellular, so that was good.  It was unlocked.  I love this phone. I can use skype on it!!!!!!!! And I can talk to it and it takes commands, which I thought only Iphone could do. So, I wouldn't even want an Iphone now.

Reviews.Content: Very nice brand new team in its case. 100% satisfied with the purchase. Unlocked H + and running on smoothly.

Reviews.Title: 100% recommended
Reviews.Author: Mario B.
Reviews.Content: excellent phone design is really beautiful, modern and comfortable. Your camera is great and the size is very comfortable in the hand. only bad thing is the battery should last more

Reviews.Title: Small, light, and great features- best of all, it's unlocked.
Reviews.Author: BILLPRO
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone so that I can use it in my travels.  However, my I-phone's mic went bad, so I am using the phone locally.  I use straight talk, with the I-phone I did have some data issues every now and then, weak signal.  It is much weaker now with the Galaxy, don't know if it is due to this phone, or the carrier.  Having said that, the voice portion of the phone is much superior to my  I phone 4-s, as is the camera.  The phone is fast and is a top of the line product.  My only concern is whether this phone will have poor reception once I am abroad.  If not, then this is a 5 star phone, and the issue is with my carrier.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Natasha Trotman
Reviews.Content: The Samsung galaxy was a nice purchase, a real upgrade for me from my blackberry storm. One thing I have to get use to is there is no notification indicator which flashes to show that you have new msgs etc.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: darwinDOFH
Reviews.Content: very very very nice it is the best buy in the year thank you for this product i love realy!!

Reviews.Title: It is ideal for me
Reviews.Author: FELICIA FRANCESE
Reviews.Content: The only objection is because I received the phone without any user manual, no instructions at all. The plug of the charger needs an adaptor device, our system in Venezuela is different. I just received the phone and need to prove it further. Hope not to find any other problem.

Reviews.Title: Not entirely happy

Reviews.Content: I really like the phone, i bought the international version. But turns out my charger does not work, it does nothing... i hope my phone does not have problems in the future.

I really do not like this cellphone cause it is kinda slow for me, if you just need a good phone with internet  to call and send messages this is for you.

Please can any one help me out? i'm in need of this whatsap application. as side that, the phone is perfectly ok and allright. pls i need your help on it. Thanks....

Reviews.Title: I adore this phone!

Reviews.Title: Be aware
Reviews.Author: Mrlean
Reviews.Content: This phone performed well for its short life of three months; Smooth clear sound and really fast everything you want on a cell phone. But after just over 90 days of used the phone just stop working. It was plugging on the charger for the night and the next morning the phone was dead I tried everything to make the phone turn on (different plug different charger held the power button for 20 s held all three buttons together, try connect it to the pc) it wouldn't come on. and it seems that type of issue it;s common with samsung phones they call it the screen of death. The seller won't do anything for me because it's been over 90 days since I bought the phone (even tho I used it for less than 90 days) so I tried to contact samsung but this model GT-I8190 it's not cover by any type of warranty as matter of fact this phone is no where to be found in samsung website. So I'm now stocked with a non working device.So before buying any samsung product make sure its cover by samsung's warranty or buy and extended warranty from a third party.

Reviews.Title: FINE
Reviews.Author: Pilar Monsalve
Reviews.Content: The delivery of the phone was on time, in perfect conditionthe camera is great, the sharpness of the videos is wonderfulGood price, works with 3G and 4G Vzla

It uses a Sims Card and the receiver of this phone is very satisfied. She wanted the S4 but is so satisfied with this one. The price was great too.

Reviews.Title: Excellent

Reviews.Content: I bought this as Christams gift for my son. It look great. Thin and light, easy to carry. The screen is clearly. My son was very happy to get this gift.

Reviews.Title: Great phone that fits my budget
Reviews.Author: Janet Mbugua
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone so far... right size, right features, and right price. I just switched from my very old, very simple non-smart phone after a very very long time of searching and researching. I didn't care much for having the latest and greatest gadget in the market but I just wanted something that would keep me communicating swiftly either via emails, media like FB, twitter and be able get me organized syncing all my stuff together, and this phone is doing just that for me. It was shipped right when they said it would in perfect condition! Thanks Samsung...

Reviews.Title: In love with my phone!
Reviews.Author: Alejandra Torres
Reviews.Content: It was about time for me to change my old phone. Ive had my Blackberry Javelin since I was 17 and now that i am 21 years old the phone is all destroyed, the keyboard is all messed up, I tossed it against the wall, against the floor and i dropped lots of water and alcohol to my old phone. Hahaha! After all, my phone turned out to be very noble!I bought this S3 mini and wow i cant believe how fast it arrived. I am beyond thrilled!! i finally have a GOOD and MODERN CELLPHONE! its white, its fab and its very nice!! i am loving IT!!! thanks for the service! i would recommend this seller to ANYONE

Reviews.Content: This phone even though it says it is International version, it does not work with some networks. I recommend that before buying the phone you consider asking the bands and network that your network provider works with in order to confirm that this phone will work with it.

I came from being a Blackberry user to this my first android product.  Everything is as described.

Reviews.Content: My wife is very happy with this phone.It works very fine in VENEZUELA.The only bad is its the charger, I don't know why it doesn't have the charger of the S3.My wife change from Blackberry and the Charger of its Blackberry is better.That charger is not practical.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone

Reviews.Content: I choose the mini because of the convenient size. It is compact enough to fit well on a belt holder but still has a relatively large screen. It is not difficult to learn how to use it efficiently and it does everything that is advertized.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE!!!
Reviews.Author: lydial713
Reviews.Content: I really love this phone! I enjoy every single second of it! If u want a phone that's inexpensive, easy to use with Straight Talk (or any other prepaid service I'm sure) and isn't embarrassing to carry around, this is it! It's exactly like the Galaxy s3 original just smaller. My friend often says that she wished she would have gotten the mini because of the ease of usage compared to the original. Wonderful phone!

Reviews.Title: radical change

Reviews.Content: hundred percent excellent product very happy recommended this purchase had a blacberry bold 1 and when buying this was a radical change in the speed and quality product highly recommend Samsung products are Jinto to apple the best phone in the market

Reviews.Title: Awesome Phone
Reviews.Author: Ronald E. Pacheco González
Reviews.Content: I really liked this phone. Fast, powerful and despite not being very fond of huge phones...with time...you get used to it. And it's a mini, it's not as big as an S3 or S4.Responds fast and the battery last a full day. This will depend on how much you use it, if you navigate, listen to music, call or text.I mustly text, tweet and send and receive pictures, and by the end of the day the battery is at around 10%.If you can charge it at the office, then even better. But that's common with todays phones.This one came without NFC or S-Beam.

Reviews.Title: Not so good performance
Reviews.Author: Andres Fernando Hernandez Senegal
Reviews.Content: The product is ok, I received it on perfect state but the performance is not what I expected. Finally it get too slow.

Reviews.Title: great

Reviews.Content: It's perfect gift no problem with the items hghly recomended. The quality of the product as expected no issues at all

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase.

Reviews.Content: Very easy to use. Good graphic interface: functions are accessible by one touch. Very fast comparing to my other Samsung model GT S5830.

Reviews.Title: Works great in the US and BRAZIL
Reviews.Author: Apple
Reviews.Content: Great phone, sleek and mini which is just perfect for my needs. Works well in the US with ATT prepaid plan. Soon I will try it in Brazil and repost. Quick manual that comes in the box is entirely in French so I downloaded the English version manual online, which was not a problem.AFTER USING THIS PHONE FOR OVER A MONTH I CAN ATTEST IT WORKS GREAT IN SOUTH AMERICA, SPECIALLY BRAZIL. NO COMPLAINS!

Reviews.Title: It rocks

Reviews.Content: This phone is enough for most of regular users. It have everything inside for a good price.Nice good looking is a plus.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!

Reviews.Title: best purchase ever!
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: I recieved the phone on time, is totally unlocked and with the accesories is suposse to, WORKS WITH SIM CARD, perfectly packaged and works just great IN NICARAGUA, I LOVE MY S3 MINI FULLY RECOMMEND IT :3

Reviews.Title: Love the phone!
Reviews.Author: Maria Urdaneta
Reviews.Content: Upgrading from an early xperia phone, I didnt want to change Sony, but I'm really happy with the purchase. GReat phone for a great price, not a supersonic thing, but for the regular user is just perfect!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: naadsexy
Reviews.Content: I bought the phone for a friend and so far he is enjoying it.Good reception,  screen is okay and takes nice pictures. He loves it. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Francisco Nucete
Reviews.Content: This purchase was one of the best.The item arrived fast and filled all my espectations, now I'm very happy cause the phone works great.Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great mobile phone
Reviews.Author: Diego Nogare
Reviews.Content: My wife and I liked a lot these mobile phones. The weight and size are better than the regular size (bigger than this one).

Reviews.Title: Good supplier, very good product
Reviews.Author: Hector Luis Giusto
Reviews.Content: Right supplier and very good product. Same conditions that the big one model , maybe the light blinking in nthe front advising some news is missing.

Reviews.Title: This phone fits at all !!! Perfect !!!
Reviews.Author: Rachel Pontes
Reviews.Content: This phone is perfect. Everything inside !! And it`s very easy to use. Also you can extend memory with a 32 gb sd card !! What else do we need??? Rachel Pontes

Reviews.Title: One of the best phone on the market
Reviews.Author: AHHHH
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my wife. Since the phone is unlock, all we had to do was to place the sim card in this phone. My wife loves it and she uses all features of this phone specially the video camera. All she wishes is that If i would of purchase the 16 G VS 8G because she could of record more.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: memo93
Reviews.Content: This is practical and versatile phone for my daughter's activities so it is enjoying his new team in college and with her friends Thanks.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING PHONE
Reviews.Author: Juan Carlos Solorzano
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with this phone, was a great buy !! it's very fast and work fantastic and best of all is the Android Jelly Bean OS !!

Reviews.Title: I love this Phone
Reviews.Author: Alejandro Sifontes
Reviews.Content: this is an excellent phone, response very quick, the camera is awesome, android 4.1 is excellent and help the phone to do the best. i really love this phone. thank you to the seller for the excellent attention.

Reviews.Title: Love my new samsung galaxy s3 mini
Reviews.Author: Maryely Ocando
Reviews.Content: I loooved my cellphone. It's brand new and so good product! great cellphone! I highly recommend it! Works perfectly in Venezuela, just placed my sim card on it and worked inmediately. came on its original box with all the accesories

Reviews.Title: The worst buy ever!!!!!! :-(
Reviews.Author: Namwen_88
Reviews.Content: I had the phone and it worked for 3 weeks then it just froze and would not turn on. I took it to a technician and he pointed out to me that while the phone appeared to be new it was clearly tampered with. There were missing screws inside and the warranty screws were gone too. Save your monies and dont get this...this is an honest review fr a really disgruntled customer.

Reviews.Title: bad
Reviews.Author: mathias acurero
Reviews.Content: bad product, several weeks ago had bought a phone at the same buyer who turned out to be excellent in spite that the box is open and I was not factory sealed as expected however worked perfectly. Therefore I decided to buy another phone from the same vendor. turns out that this new phone has difficulty lighting and has a bit slow software

Reviews.Title: THE INTERNAL MEMORY IS NOT 8GB
Reviews.Author: JuanJose
Reviews.Content: I received this new phone all new and it works very well but the only bad thing is that the internal memory is not 8GB. It is 5GB.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Bee Shaw
Reviews.Content: Im so in love with this phone, it has been a great experience so far, I must say, I received the product on time, the phone is performing optimally, I would recommend this product and this seller.

Reviews.Title: not for sprint or verizon!
Reviews.Author: reaper06allday
Reviews.Content: This phone is NOT compatible with Sprint or Verizon. They are not GSM network. Check your network before you buy this phone, it does not clearly say which networks it works on!!

Reviews.Title: I recive the L version the frequency is 850 to use 3 g and i need 900
Reviews.Author: federico
Reviews.Content: I dont know how to solve this problem cuz i buy this cell phone thinking that like it says here is 900 frequency

Reviews.Title: works 4G?
Reviews.Author: Jorge H. Gil "jorge"
Reviews.Content: I want this phone but I have a few question about the phone.this phone work with 4G network?work for mexico carriers?

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: VIV
Reviews.Content: My teenage daughter loves this...... she can't put this phone down. Always on it. She said all her friends didn't know that samsung had a mini galaxy, now most of her friends have changes their phones to mini galaxys.

Reviews.Title: pretty nice
Reviews.Author: Thonny
Reviews.Content: Excellent. All good i love it. And the deliver was good too i recomend it, its cool and helpfull !

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: M. Asim Yousafzai
Reviews.Content: it looks and feels great. The screen functionality is very smooth and minimum physical buttons had to be pushed. Great.

Reviews.Title: thanks
Reviews.Author: Carmen
Reviews.Content: thank for sending me the samsung galaxy iii.its the best technology i have got ever. technology.there is nothing better than this.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy an international phone if you live in the US
Reviews.Author: Mackenzie Bolduc
Reviews.Content: We did not know that this phone would not work with the Verizon network in the US. There is nothing that stated that before or at the time of purchase. Because the phone was manufactured in the UK, the US Samsung cannot help us. Wireless Everything is only open during the weekdays so if you are trying to get help, you can't do it on the weekends. This has all been very frustrating because although the order was shipped in the time that was promised, it does not actually work with Verizon. There are certain codes that are needed for unlocked phones, and with Verizon it is very hard to obtain the proper codes. DON'T ORDER THIS PHONE IF YOU LIVE IN THE US AND HAVE VERIZON WIRELESS AS YOUR NETWORK CARRIER

Reviews.Title: The Phone does not work at all
Reviews.Author: Carla Brookes-Harris
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed with this phone, it is not connecting with the network and the screen is not clear.

Reviews.Title: curious
Reviews.Author: adrianna
Reviews.Content: Will they take cut SIM cards? I had an s3 but want this smaller one && dont know if it will work with my cut SIM!

Reviews.Title: Big problem
Reviews.Author: Jamile Brandi
Reviews.Content: I've got a broken mobile. Since the first time I powered it on it would turn off all the time. I tried the hard reset, factory reset and none of them worked out. Maybe I wasn't lucky enough.

Reviews.Title: Great phone and great price
Reviews.Author: Justine N. Williams "Juice"
Reviews.Content: This is a super phone, perfect size for those who do not want to walk around with the huge galaxy 3. Tons of feature, very sleek appearance. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Sucks
Reviews.Author: dong bi
Reviews.Content: Sucks, bought back the old shut down, but not replace, he said no problem returning to return to it, simply did not even look to send over, this person too wicked.

Reviews.Title: I like it!
Reviews.Author: Desita
Reviews.Content: The phone works perfect with mobile operator (bob) in BULGARIA! I use it to make call from USA to BULGARIA. I am so happy!
